channel.title: Encryption on Muhammad Al Farizzi
channel.description: Recent content in Encryption on Muhammad Al Farizzi

item.title: RSA
item.description: RSA (Rivest-Shamir-Adlema) is asymmetric encryption algorithm it works by encrypt plain message using public key, and descrypt using private key. public key can be shared amongs parties/services/client but the private key must be kept for server/message processor because encrypted message only can be descrypted by right pair private key.
